channel.title: How do i change max level? (combat + non combat)
channel.description:
hi, i have a source and i want the max for every skill to be 99... but when it reaches it if you keep training that skill it keeps going to 100 and 101 and i keep getting the skill cape for that skill can someone help me?
- boomer4456
